page.title: 18PUBLIC TRANSPORT - TRAINS
page.content:
There are two minor British Railways lines which cross our area.
The North London Line runs in an arc from North Woolwich in Docklands, via Broad Street, in the City of London, to Richmond, south of the Thames. It has one stop in our area, at Gunners- bury Station, which is also served by the underground (District Line).It then crosses the river east of Kew Bridge to continue to Kew Gardens.
The British Railways line from Waterloo to Hounslow has stations at Kew Bridge and Brentford.
London Regional Transport also has major railway works in our area. Its Apprentice Training School is located in Gunnersbury Lane. It has facilities for 160 apprentices.
